siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: 9 QUESTIONS 24/7 Live Youtube stream quiz game. Rounds of 9 Questions. 15 seconds for each question. You can play with a team or solo. A relaxing quiz game experience. Thousands of quality questions.
blogPost.body: 9 QUESTIONS 24/7 Live Youtube stream quiz game. Rounds of 9 Questions. 15 seconds for each question. You can play with a team or solo. A relaxing quiz game experience. Thousands of quality questions.
blogPost.title: 9 QUESTIONS - 24/7 live stream quiz game with thousands of questions.
blogPost.author: Dimitris Chassapakis

localize.description: 9个问题全天候直播YouTube流问答游戏。共9轮提问。每个问题15秒。你可以组队打球，也可以单人打球。轻松的智力竞赛体验。数以千计的质量问题。
localize.tagline: 24/7全天候直播流问答游戏，包含数千个问题。

localize.description: 9個問題全天候直播YouTube流問答遊戲。共9輪提問。每個問題15秒。你可以組隊打球，也可以單人打球。輕鬆的智力競賽體驗。數以千計的質量問題。
localize.tagline: 24/7全天候直播流問答遊戲，包含數千個問題。

previous.excerpt: Jumpr is the world’s first AR jump rope! Simply place your iPhone upright on the floor, Jumpr uses AI-powered body tracking to detect your movement and give you a virtual jump rope on the screen to begin skipping away!
previous.title: Jumpr - Virtual jump rope APP

localize.description: Jumpr是世界上第一根AR跳绳！只需将你的iPhone直立放在地板上，Jumpr使用人工智能驱动的身体跟踪来检测你的移动，并在屏幕上给你一个虚拟的跳绳，开始跳走！
Jumpr是世界上第一根AR跳繩！只需將你的iPhone直立放在地板上，Jumpr使用人工智能驅動的身體跟蹤來檢測你的移動，並在屏幕上給你一個虛擬的跳繩，開始跳走！

next.excerpt: Reading and gaining knowledge shouldn't be a chore. Get one weekly Substack email digest from your favorite Substack writers.
next.title: Thank you for reading - Personalized Substack summaries

localize.description: 阅读和获取知识不应该是一件苦差事。每周从您最喜欢的子栈作者那里获取一份子栈电子邮件摘要。
閱讀和獲取知識不應該是一件苦差事。每週從您最喜歡的子棧作者那裏獲取一份子棧電子郵件摘要。
